meanings.definition: A drug used to treat type 2 diabetes by decreasing glucose production in the liver and improving insulin sensitivity in the body.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed metformin to help control my blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: Many people with diabetes take metformin to manage their condition effectively.
meanings.sent3: After taking metformin, I felt like my liver was on a glucose diet!
meanings.sent4: Metformin is like a superhero that fights against high blood sugar levels in the body.
meanings.sent5: The impact of metformin on insulin sensitivity is truly remarkable.
